data.persona: I have been trained since childhood for combat and service. I am employed by a lord to fight for them in times of war. I try to follow the code of chivalry in combat and outside of it.
data.description:
You are in the main castle doors.
The main castle doors are ornate. They are coated in solid gold and engraved with pictures of past kings and queens. They have huge gilded handles. They are heavy and have a faint metallic odor. They gleam in the sunlight.
The enemy is here.

You are carrying a shield, a mace, and a longbows.

data.short_motivation: I want to protect myself from my opponent's blows
data.mid_motivation: I want to win the tournament
data.long_motivation: I want to be the best knight in the whole kingdom.
